artefactsOfPower.name: Sevenfold Shadow
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: This hero possesses a living shadow that can, at a command, envelop them and transport them across the shadow realm.
artefactsOfPower.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefactsOfPower.name: Khainite Pendant
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: The wearer can call for Khaine’s blessing as easily as drawing breath.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE **PRIEST**** wholly within 12" of this unit.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Give that unit D6 ritual points.

artefactsOfPower.name: Crown of Woe
artefactsOfPower.lore: Forged from the cult of Khaine’s first sacrificial altar, an aura of dread surrounds the wearer of this baleful crown.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 9" of this unit.

battleTraits.name: All-out Slaughter
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: The leaders of the Daughters of Khaine can exhort their warriors to commit acts of terrible slaughter.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE **INFANTRY**** unit that is in combat to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can use 2 ****FIGHT**** abilities this phase. After the first is used, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Blood Rites
battleTraits.lore: Before battle, the Daughters take part in holy rites of bloodletting. With each sacrifice, the faithful are imbued with a fraction of their god’s furious power.
battleTraits.effect:
A different effect applies to friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** units each battle round, as shown below. The effects of all previous battle rounds also apply to those units.

**Battle Round 1:**
***Quickening Bloodlust:*** Add 1 to **run** rolls for this unit.

**Battle Round 2:**
***Headlong Fury:*** Add 1 to **charge** rolls for this unit.

**Battle Round 3:**
***Zealot’s Rage:*** Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

**Battle Round 4:**
***Slaughterer’s Wound:*** Add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

**Battle Round 5:**
***Frenzied Worshippers:*** Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.

regimentAbilities.name: Murderous Epiphany
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: The Khainites are struck by a terrible vision of the Bloody-Handed God that drives their zeal to ever greater heights.
regimentAbilities.effect: All friendly units gain the **Blood Rites** passive ability they would have gained at the start of the next battle round (they keep this ability for the rest of the battle, but they do not gain it for a second time at the start of the next battle round).

regimentAbilities.name: Blessing of Khaine
regimentAbilities.lore: Sacred rites have been performed on this Melusai Ironscale by the priestesses of the temple, and it is said that she can bestow the blessing of Khaine upon her sisters in battle.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit wholly within 12" of your general. You cannot pick your general.
regimentAbilities.effect: Add 1 to ward rolls for that unit this phase.

heroicTraits.name: Zealous Orator
heroicTraits.lore: Your general is a wild demagogue who inspires her followers to fight on in the face of impossible odds.
heroicTraits.effect: If a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

heroicTraits.name: Bathed in Blood
heroicTraits.lore: This hero bathes in gore during battle, granting her healing powers.
heroicTraits.effect: **Heal (3)** this unit if it is in combat.

heroicTraits.name: Master of Poisons
heroicTraits.lore: This hero has intimate knowledge of all poisons and coats her blades in an elixir that leaves the most hardened warriors weak, debilitated and primed for the killing stroke.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit’s combat attacks to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect:
For the rest of the battle:

• The target cannot be healed.
• Slain models cannot be returned to the target unit.

abilities.name: Martyr's Sacrifice
abilities.lore: The priestess beseeches Khaine to give those faithful who have been slain the strength to deliver one final blow.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time a model in the target unit is slain by a combat attack, before removing the model from play, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a dice. If the chanting roll was 8+, roll 2 dice instead of 1. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that enemy unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Covenant of the Iron Heart
abilities.lore: The hearts of the Murder God’s followers become as cold and hard as iron, crushing their fears and doubts with a chilling contempt.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to the target’s control score until the start of your next turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, add 5 to the target’s control score until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Sacrament of Blood
abilities.lore: The dreaded rune of Khaine spontaneously manifests on the brows of the faithful as if carved there by some ghostly knife.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the current battle round number when determining which effects of the ‘Blood Rites’ ability apply to the target. If the chanting roll was 10+, until the start of your next turn, treat the current battle round number as 5 when determining which effects of the ‘Blood Rites’ ability apply to the target instead.

abilities.name: Summon Bladewind
abilities.lore: The caster calls upon their mastery of blood magic to conjure a twirling quartet of giant, blood-slick blades.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Bladewind** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Bladewind** wholly within 9" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Heart of Fury
abilities.lore: The skies turn crimson as this bleeding icon descends upon the battle.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Heart of Fury** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Heart of Fury** wholly within 9" of the chanter and visible to them.

abilities.name: Summon Bloodwrack Viper
abilities.lore: The caster weaves their outstretched hand in an elaborate pattern that mimics the structure of a monstrous snake drenched in blood.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Bloodwrack Viper** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Bloodwrack Viper** wholly within 9" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Doomfire
abilities.lore: The wizard hurls bolt of blazing black flame at their foes.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
If the target unit has fewer than 10 models, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

If the target unit has 10-19 models, inflict D6 mortal damage on the target.

If the target unit has 20 or more models, inflict 6 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Steed of Shadows
abilities.lore: A coal-black creature with wings of night materialises from the darkness and swoops across the battlefield, hastening the movement of the Khainites below.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target can use **CHARGE** abilities this turn even if it used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Mindrazor
abilities.lore: The wizard summons spectral blades into their allies’ hands, weapons whose edges are honed by the wielder’s faith as much as the victim’s fear.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn. In addition, if the target charged this turn, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of its melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Speed of the Scáthborn
abilities.lore: The Melusai and Khinerai that make up the Vyperic Guard strike at the heart of their enemies with lethal speed and accuracy.
abilities.effect: If the unmodified charge roll for a friendly **MELUSAI** or **KHINERAI** unit is 8+, that unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Shadowpaths
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: Well versed in the secrets of the shadowpaths, these warriors strike where least expected.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE INFANTRY** unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Gladiatorial Acrobatics
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a CHARGE ability for a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF unit
abilities.lore: The aelves of a Slaughter Troupe perform breathtaking displays of acrobatics as they close the distance to the foe.
abilities.effect: Change one of the dice in the charge roll to a 4.

abilities.name: Frenzied Devotees
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: The Cauldron Guard seek to carve a path for their worshipped engines through enemy defences at the earliest opportunity.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE INFANTRY** or **WAR MACHINE** units that are in combat to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move.
• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.
